## All 4 Hue for Philips Hue: Review and Features

All 4 Hue is a software that allows you to control Philips Hue lights from your computer. Here is an overview of its features and benefits.

### What is Philips Hue?

Philips Hue is a smart lighting system that allows you to control your lights from your smartphone or tablet. You can change the color and brightness of your lights, set schedules, and even sync them with your music or movies.

### What is All 4 Hue?

All 4 Hue is a software that allows you to control your Philips Hue lights from your computer. It is particularly useful for those who spend a lot of time on their computer and want an easy way to control their lights without having to use their phone.

### Features of All 4 Hue

All 4 Hue comes with a range of features to help you control your lights more effectively. Here are some of the key features:

#### 1. Control your lights from your computer

With All 4 Hue, you can easily turn your lights on and off, adjust their brightness, and change their color from your computer. You can also group your lights together and control them all at once.

#### 2. Create schedules

All 4 Hue allows you to create schedules for your lights so that they turn on and off automatically at certain times of the day. This is a great way to save energy and to make your home look lived-in even when you're not there.

#### 3. Sync with your music

If you're a music lover, you'll love the ability to sync your lights with your music. All 4 Hue can set your lights to pulse or change color with the beat of your music, creating a unique and immersive experience.

#### 4. Customize lighting scenes

All 4 Hue provides a range of lighting scenes that you can customize to suit your needs. You can create your own scenes or choose from a range of pre-set scenes, such as "relax" or "energize".

### Benefits of All 4 Hue

Here are some of the benefits of using All 4 Hue to control your Philips Hue lights:

- Easy to use: All 4 Hue is simple to set up and use, even for those who are not tech-savvy.

- Increased productivity: By controlling your lights from your computer, you can create the ideal working environment and boost your productivity.

- Energy saving: By creating schedules for your lights, you can save energy and reduce your electricity bill.

- Customizable: All 4 Hue allows you to customize your lighting to suit your needs and create the perfect ambiance for any occasion.

### Conclusion

If you're a fan of Philips Hue and spend a lot of time on your computer, All 4 Hue is a must-have software. With its range of features and benefits, it's a great way to control your lights from your computer and create the ideal environment for any occasion. Try it out today and see the benefits for yourself!
